Text:
Haven't seen yet the new HD Texture re-release (incl.fixes) from Bethesda.

It would be nice someone torrents it.

yes, as someone said above: texture pack was released yesterday from Bethesda; can someone upload all official texture packs ? t should be around 7 gb vanilla + dawnguard + dragonborn and hearthfire if I'm correct. o mighty RELOADED help us in this dark hour !

when I said yesterday I meant central european time - it is still "today" for usa citizens ( and I think, presume that reloaded is from US, well doesnt matter )

what is important: these textures are very much needed, without them dragonborn is fairly poor looking
Thanks for your effort! But could you please also upload the updated HD textures? Very very thanks, sincerely!
